Formatting %d followed by words ("minutes"): This should probably be a plural rather than a string
Formatting %d followed by words ("hours"): This should probably be a plural rather than a string
Formatting %d followed by words ("seconds"): This should probably be a plural rather than a string
Formatting %d followed by words ("days"): This should probably be a plural rather than a string
Insecure Base Configuration
It will always be more efficient to use more specific change events if you can. Rely on `notifyDataSetChanged` as a last resort.
Very long vector path (904 characters), which is bad for performance. Considering reducing precision, removing minor details or rasterizing vector.
Possible overdraw: Root element paints background `?attr/selectableItemBackground` with a theme that also paints a background (inferred theme is `@style/Theme.AmpMeter`)
